 17 /**
 18  * @class Abstract VR renderer base class.
 19  */
 20 bigshot.AbstractVRRenderer = function () {
 21 }
 22 
 23 bigshot.AbstractVRRenderer.prototype = {
 24     /**
 25      * Transforms a vector to world coordinates.
 26      *
 27      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} vector the vector to transform
 28      */
 29     transformToWorld : function transformToWorld (vector) {
 30         var world = this.mvMatrix.matrix ().xPoint3Dhom1 (vector);
 31         
 32         return world;
 33     },
 34     
 35     /**
 36      * Transforms a world vector to screen coordinates.
 37      *
 38      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} world the world-vector to transform
 39      */
 40     transformWorldToScreen : function transformWorldToScreen (world) {
 41         if (world.z > 0) {
 42             return null;
 43         }
 44         
 45         var screen = this.pMatrix.matrix ().xPoint3Dhom (world);
 46         if (Math.abs (screen.w) < Sylvester.precision) {
 47             return null;
 48         }
 49         
 50         var sx = screen.x;
 51         var sy = screen.y;
 52         var sz = screen.z;
 53         var vw = this.getViewportWidth ();
 54         var vh = this.getViewportHeight ();
 55         
 56         var r = {
 57             x: (vw / 2) * sx / sz + vw / 2, 
 58             y: - (vh / 2) * sy / sz + vh / 2
 59         };
 60         return r;
 61     },
 62     
 63     /**
 64      * Transforms a vector to screen coordinates.
 65      *
 66      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} vector the vector to transform
 67      * @return the transformed vector, or null if the vector is nearer than the near-z plane.
 68      */
 69     transformToScreen : function transformToScreen (vector) {
 70         var sel = this.mvpMatrix.xPoint3Dhom (vector);
 71         
 72         if (sel.z < 0) {
 73             return null;
 74         }
 75         
 76         var sz = sel.w;
 77         
 78         if (Math.abs (sel.w) < Sylvester.precision) {
 79             return null;
 80         }
 81         
 82         var sx = sel.x;
 83         var sy = sel.y;
 84         var vw = this.getViewportWidth ();
 85         var vh = this.getViewportHeight ();
 86         
 87         var r = {
 88             x: (vw / 2) * sx / sz + vw / 2, 
 89             y: - (vh / 2) * sy / sz + vh / 2
 90         };
 91 
 92         return r;
 93     }
 94 }
 95
